challenge.message:
Welcome to warlock!
Click to sign in and accept the warlock Terms of Service: https://warlock.io/terms-of-service
This request will not trigger a blockchain transaction or cost any gas fees.
Your authentication status will reset after 24 hours.
Wallet address:
{walletAddress}
Nonce:
{nonce}

error.refreshTokenNotFoundInCache: Refresh token not found in cache

error.forbidden: User does not have the required permission: {requiredPermission}. The user's current permissions are: {userPermissions}

error.emailNotMatching: The email address entered does not match the user's email address in the database
error.hasConfirmedEmail: The user's email address has already been validated
